content: small bob materials malabrigo lace baby merino natural # 63 black # 195 applewood #18 and perl ten # 69 for snout embroidery crochet hook 2 5mm and 1 5 mm sewing needle accesories 2 black doll eyes or collar beads of approx 6mm stuffing for head pattern stitch single_crochet with the yarn in front of the hook in the first step step1 insert hook into the stich bring yarn over hook but upwards with the yarn in front and the hook behind and draw yarn throug the stitch and up onto the hook there are now two loops on hook step 2 bring yarn over hook and draw it through both loops on hook step 1 step 2 techniques when rounds are worked in a continuous spiral don´t join rounds with slip_stitch but place marker between last and first stitch and carry the marker up on each round when working back and forth turn and make the first single_crochet of next round in the same single_crochet where you have the hook if starting with chain turn and always make the first single_crochet in the second loop from hook see picture of step 1 when starting and ending each part always leave a 8 tail for sewing abreviations chain chain single_crochet single_crochet pm place mark directions body and head black 3 threads together 2 5mm hook chain 26 close and pm round 1- single_crochet in each chain round 2- single_crochet in each single_crochet repeat this round 14 more times round 17- *single_crochet in second single_crochet from hook single_crochet in each next 4 single_crochet* repeat from * to * 3 more times single_crochet in second single_crochet from hook 21 stitches round 18- * 2sc in next single_crochet single_crochet in each next 4 single_crochet* repeat from * to * 3 more times end with 2 single_crochet in last stitch 26 stitches work single_crochet in each single_crochet for 6 rounds head work in a continuous spiral don t count rounds round 25- *single_crochet in second single_crochet from hook single_crochet in each next 7 single_crochet* repeat from * to * 2 more times - *single_crochet in second single_crochet from hook single_crochet in each of next 6 single_crochet* repeat from * to * 1 more time - single_crochet in second single_crochet from hook single_crochet in each next 5 single_crochet - *single_crochet in second single_crochet from hook single_crochet in each next 4 single_crochet* repeat from * to * 1 more time - single_crochet in second single_crochet from hook single_crochet in each next 3 single_crochet - *single_crochet in second single_crochet from hook single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet* repeat from * to * 1 more time - *single_crochet in second single_crochet from hook* repeat from * to * until 3 single_crochet - close snout natural 3 threads 0000 hook chain 5 close work in a continuous spiral round 1- 8 single_crochet in the central loop round 2- 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet 16 stitches round 3- single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in
